'''Ancient City Key''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained in an [[Exquisite Chest]] after completing a [[Jade Incense Cauldron]] puzzle in [[Chizhang Wall]], [[Liyue]].

It can be used in a southern section of Chizang Wall to unlock a room rewarding three [[Chest]]s and the {{Achievement|At the Construction of the Endless Wall}}.
